summary: Port 80 Denial Of Service. In a denial-of-service (DoS) attack an attacker attempts to prevent legitimate users from accessing information or services.

title: When you type a URL for a particular website into your browser
summary: you are sending a request to that site's computer server to view the page.

title: The server can only process a certain number of requests at once
summary: so if an attacker overloads the server with requests
column3: it can't process your request. This is a 'denial of service' because you can't access that site.

title: The most common and obvious type of DoS attack occurs when an attacker 'floods' a network with information.
